title: The Dance Guru is All Set With a New Comedy
text:
Email 2 
Dancer, choreographer, actor and director Prabhudeva speaks on helming Singh is Bliing, working with international dancers, directing comedies, and more. 
With Singh Is Bliing, you are teaming up with Akshay Kumar once again after the smash hit Rowdy Rathore (2012). Are you under pressure because of the expectations? 
I never feel the pressure. It is a new film for me. 
Your earlier films were masala entertainers while Singh Is Bliing is a comedy film. 
As a director you have to do all kinds of films. My other films also have a touch of comedy but this film is 80 per cent comedy. 
Do you share a good rapport with Akshay Kumar? 
While we were shooting Singh Is Bliing, Akshay made some mistake and he accepted it. He said one should bow oneâ€™s head to do better. During the shooting of a song, Akshay got burnt but he insisted on doing the shot again. He wanted to overcome his fear. 
Prabhudeva Do you also relate to Akshay Kumar the person? 
Once he showed me a message that he had got from someone which said that a certain person needed a job. He felt that person should be given a job and we did, he is a part of the film. 
What do you think went wrong with your previous film Action Jackson? Were you disappointed? 
I think I went wrong with Action Jackson. There is always a second chance. Yes of course, I was disappointed. I am a normal human being. 
Have you ever been scared or nervous about dancing with anyone? 
It was while dancing for ABCD and ABCD 2 because the dancers in those two films are too dangerous. They are dancers of international standards. So dancing with them was tough. 
Has dance changed in Bollywood? 
I think we do have good dancers now like Hrithik Roshan, Shahid Kapoor, Tiger Shroff. I am a choreographer for 28 years or so. It is part of my job to make actors dance. 
Is it true that you were going to work with Amitabh Bachchan? 
There was an opportunity to work with him but things did not happen because of date issues. I hope to work with him. Whenever he calls, I will be ready.
